Html:
Hey,

I'm trying to put a front page in a separate section before the main content, because the front page should not contain a header and footer like the other pages of my exported document.

As soon as i add content before i add the toc, the table of content is not added to the document.
Can anyone tell me why this fails? Is this maybe a bug?

THX,

Jan

Hey Jan,

Not sure if you resolve this problem but I fixed it by declaring more then one section:
  // Section for the front page
  $front = $PHPWord->createSection();
  // Section for the rest of the documents
  $section = $PHPWord->createSection();
Cliff
